comp102x.assignment

Class Goal

  • java.lang.Object
    • comp102x.assignment.Goal

  • public class Goal
extends java.lang.Object
    The Goal class represents a goal the can be hit by a football. The goal can either be stationary or movable.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int MOVABLE
      Indicates the goal is movable.
      static int STATIONARY
      Indicates the goal is not movable.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Goal(int type, boolean isHit)
      Constructs a goal of a certain type and initializing its hit status.

      Returns the hit status of the goal.

      Sets the hit status of the goal.
